articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: US Current Events: Politics, Weather, and Tragedy
articles.description: The summary details various US news items, including Trump's White House appointments amid a winter storm, Biden expanding Social Security benefits, New Orleans' barrier issue after a vehicle attack, and the tragic death of director Jeff Baena, husband of Aubrey Plaza.
articles.content:
Amid concerns over the strength of New Orleans' street barriers, found insufficient against potential vehicle attacks, new installations continue, as confirmed by an April engineering analysis.
President Joe Biden officially signed an expansion of So... [357 chars]

articles.title: 'That speaks volumes': Lawyer says Trump just gave 'a clear slap in the face to democracy'
articles.description: Donald Trump's recent Mar-a-Lago gathering to promote a Jan. 6 lawyer's new documentary is a "clear slap in the face to democracy," an ex-prosecutor said on Sunday.Former federal prosecutor Joyce Vance earlier in the day wrote about an "interesting footnote" that Judge Juan Merchan included in the...
articles.content:

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Biden Criticizes Trump's Birthright Citizenship Plans
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden condemned President-elect Donald Trump's plan to end birthright citizenship in the United States. Biden emphasized the importance of birthright citizenship and critiqued Trump's threatening actions against U.S. democracy, including efforts to rally lawmakers against bipartisan immigration reforms.
articles.content: President Joe Biden voiced strong criticism against President-elect Donald Trump's intention to abolish birthright citizenship in the United States, labeling the move as 'awful.' Speaking at the White House, Biden expressed concern over internal issu... [671 chars]

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Zelenskiy Seeks Trump's Security Assurance for Ukraine
articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy stresses the need for U.S. security guarantees to end Russia's war in Ukraine. He urges NATO membership for Ukraine, fearing Russian rearmament without U.S. support. Zelenskiy eyes collaboration with U.S. President-elect Donald Trump to forge a 'peace through strength' strategy.
articles.content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy has emphasized that security guarantees from the United States are crucial to ending Russia's ongoing war against Ukraine. In an interview with U.S. podcaster Lex Fridman, Zelenskiy highlighted the strategic im... [707 chars]

articles.title: Millions brace for winter storms, Biden awards Presidential Medals of Freedom: Weekend Rundown
articles.description: The New Orleans attacker visited the city weeks earlier. New York becomes the first U.S. city to implement congestion charges. And Trump is fixated on Lincoln.
articles.content:
New Orleans attacker recorded visits to the city weeks earlier

articles.author: BGR
articles.title: Amazon's Prime Video is releasing a Melania Trump documentary
articles.description: Amazon, which is donating $1 million to the second Trump inauguration, is also releasing a film about First Lady Melania Trump this year.
articles.content:
The reaction of the business community to four more years of a Trump administration is much different this time than it was after the 2016 election. Take Amazon, to use just one example.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: A Melania Trump documentary from director Brett Ratner will be released by Amazon
articles.description: Incoming first lady Melania Trump will be the subject of a new documentary directed by Brett Ratner and distributed by Amazon Prime Video.
